summary: An ex con teams up with federal agents to help them with breaking up a moonshine ring.

Armstrong|Conlan Carter|Dabbs Greer|Lincoln Demyan|John Steadman|Iris Korn|Stephanie Burchfield|Barbara Muller|Robert Ginnaven|Fay Martin|Richard Allin|Bill Bond|Sherry Boucher|Glenn R. Wilder|Dick Ziker|Buddy Joe Hooker|Cathy Finley|Laura Dern|Bob Meriwether
title: Los traficantes
